document.masterDocTitle: A sea of worms: polychaete checklist of the Adriatic Sea

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A sea of worms: polychaete checklist of the Adriatic Sea

subSubSection.paragraph:
REMARKS : According to the revision of the Autolytinae by
Nygren ( 2004 )
, the species formerly placed in the genus
Autolytus Grube, 1850
, were moved to the genus
Myrianida Milne-Edwards, 1845
.

*
Myrianida brachycephala
(
Marenzeller, 1874
) DISTRIBUTION : NA , CA, SA.
DISTRIBUTION : NA , SA.

OTHER
REPORTED NAMES
:
Autolytus convolutus Cognetti, 1953
.
DISTRIBUTION : NA , SA.

OTHER
REPORTED NAMES
:
Autolytus edwardsi Saint-Joseph, 1887
.
DISTRIBUTION : NA .

NEW
RECORDS
: Near Rovinj ( NA ), in 2008 (F. Pleijel and A. Nygren, pers. comm. ). REMARKS : This is the first record from the Adriatic Sea.

Myrianida longoprimicirrata
(López, San Martín & Jiménez, 1997 ) DISTRIBUTION : NA .

LITERATURE
RECORDS
:
Nygren et al . 2010
.
DISTRIBUTION : NA , SA.

LITERATURE
RECORDS
:
Cognetti 1958
;
Požar-Domac 1986
, 1994 ;
Castelli et al . 2008
.
DISTRIBUTION : NA , CA, SA.

OTHER
REPORTED NAMES
:
Autolytus prolifer (O.F. Müller, 1788 )
;
Autolytus prolifera (O.F. Müller, 1788 )
. REMARKS :
Nygren ( 2004 )
reports the distribution of this species to be North East Atlantic and emphasizes that the name
M. prolifera
(as
Autolytus prolifer
) has been used for different, inadequately determined species. Preserved specimens may be confused mostly with
M. edwarsi (
Nygren 2004
)
.
DISTRIBUTION : NA , SA.

LITERATURE
RECORDS
: Giangrande et al . 2003, 2004 ;
Castelli et al . 2008
;
Mikac & Musco 2010
.
OTHER
REPORTED NAMES
:
Autolytus quindecimdentatus Langerhans, 1884
.
*
Myrianida rubropunctata
(
Grube, 1860
)
DISTRIBUTION : NA .

OTHER
REPORTED NAMES
:

Grube, 1860
)
;
Sylline rubropunctata
Grube, 1860
;
Syllis rubropunctata
Grube, 1860
